post.text: This is a struggle for the survival of OUR nation, and this will be our last chance to save it. We MUST raise our voices on November 8th!

comment.author: Dakotah
comment.text: Donald Trump will not become president of the United States, because Americans understand that togetherness trumps divisiveness, and that love trumps hatred.

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: Do you love Donald Trump Trump?

replies.author: Mackenzie
replies.text: Yeah, democrats have many groups to divide. White against black, male vs female, gay vs straight, college educated vs non college educated, transgender, muslim, Hispanic etc. Tell me how make America great again divides everyone...?
